product.name: ACMEART Ceiling Curtain Track,Retractable Ceiling Track for Curtains,2.8-5.2ft,Room Divider Curtain Rod,Ceiling Rails Set with Silent Rollers and Hooks for Living room/Bedroom/Shower/RV
product.bullet_points:
• TOP QUALITY CEILING TRACK Set –Freely expandable from 33.6 inches to 62.4 inches,sized for a variety of window/room sizes,which also saves the trouble of measurement and is more convenient.
• Silent curtain track –Adopt Nano Silent Roller and #304 Stainless steel hook,no noise,all rollers are easy free sliding within the track.
• EASY TO INSTALL –Come with all accessories needed to install, guide you to install within minutes.
• Multi-Purpose: Can be used as ceiling track for curtains, room divider curtains rod, RV curtains track, shower curtains track and so on.
• NOTE - Room divider curtains are sold separately.
